trans-unit.source: The WebReferenceOptions class represents code generation options specified in an XML text file.
Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.
The <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.
Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that contains the code generation options.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that represents the schema importer extensions associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that represents the schema importer extensions associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the target namespace for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
To be added.
Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
